name: Port Monitor
description: User friendly monitoring for websites, s
overview:
Port Monitor is an online tool to monitor websites, services and hosts.

Main features

  • Simple and free sign up.
  • Online tool, installation not required.
  • No additional software required on your server.
  • User-friendly UI.
  • E-mail and SMS notifications.
  • Response time and uptime reports.
  • Detailed error logging.
  • Public API coming soon.

Who is it for? It’s a great tool for web developers, system administrators or just anyone who wants to monitor something on Internet.

What’s next? We are working on the public API and official iOS app.

We’d love to read your feedback and implement any features you suggest!
